alert.note: Alert for Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 18 at 7:22PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Windham, southern Worcester, eastern Hampshire, east central Hampden and northwestern Providence Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 721 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Brookfield, or 17 miles west of Worcester, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Milford, Grafton, Webster, Southbridge, Auburn, Burrillville, Northbridge, Oxford, Uxbridge, Millbury, Charlton, Palmer, North Smithfield, Spencer, Dudley, Leicester, Ware, Glocester and Thompson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
